content:
path /v3/dogecoin/info
operationId DogeGetBlockChainInfo
summary Get Dogecoin Blockchain Information
description 1 credit per API callGet Dogecoin Blockchain Information Obtain basic info like testnet / mainnet version of the chain current block number and its hash
responses
200
DogeInfo
type object
properties
chain
type string
description Chain of the blockchain main or test
blocks
type number
description Last block
headers
type number
description Last headers
bestblockhash
type string
description Hash of the last block
difficulty
type number
description Difficulty of the PoW algorithm
description OK
